JobTitle: Fraud Operations Manager - Uber Payments LATAM
JobFullDesc: About the RoleWe are looking for a Fraud Operations Manager who will be assessing, managing and minimizing fraud within the Payments LATAM Regional Operations team.This role is an outstanding opportunity to help expand one of Uber's newest services, Uber Payments. This is a meaningful role providing fraud management for all current Uber’s line of business. Identifying the root cause of a problem as opposed to focusing on the symptoms.3 years of robust work experience in Risk, Online Retailers, startup, strategy, operations, analytics, business development, or a variety of other specialty roles with proven track record in quantitative fields.Capacity of understanding business decisions implications and their effects on the financials, particularly regarding risk / fraud topics.Good communication skills that will allow you to clearly explain your work and to participate in constructive debateProfiency in English
